channel.title: Hisfantor's Food Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Hisfantor's Food Blog

item.title: Vegetable Pizza
item.description: Ingredients: Flour Water Yeast Paprika Scallions Corn Morzarella Gouda Cream Cheese Olive Oil Spices: Salt   Inctructions: the day before: prepare the dough, put it in the fridge the dough: add the the ammount of Flour you want, add some Olive Oil, Salt and 1⁄2 package of dry Yeast add some warm water on top of the yeast and wait 5min until you see some foam forming now start stiring with a spoon until everything is in one dough ball if it dosen’t work yet add more water but dont over do it after your dough ball is formed cover the bowl leave it for 30min at room temerature or in the fridge over night put your dough on a parchment paper on your counter add some Flour if it’s too sticky too touch start spreading it (wait a little after taking it out of the fridge makes it easier) if it springs back wait a little cutt up your toppings and grind some cheese put the parchment paper with the dough on your baking sheet(adjust it if needed) spread the Cream Cheese on the dough like you would with tomatoe souce add your toppings and some Olive Oil on the crust baking for about 15-20min at around 180Â° Indescribable:

item.title: Tuna Corn Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles canned Tuna canned Corn Spices: mustard   Inctructions: Cook your Noodles drain the oil from the Tuna in the Pan start frying in order: Noodles Tuna Corn add some Mustard I like it if everything has a nice litte char serve with some Parmesan(because more cheese always wins) Indescribable:

item.title: Steak Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles marinated BBQ Steak Onion Garlic Cream Cream Cheese Spices: Pepper   Inctructions: some time before: freeze the Steak cook your Noodles cut up Onion and Garlic, Steak(cuts better a little frozen) with some Olive Oil start frying in order: Steak Noodles Onion after everything is fried to your taste add some Cream and Cream Cheese, ceason with some additional Pepper keep it on low heat until you have no liquid left and Cream coaded Noodles serve with some Parmesan(because more cheese always wins) Indescribable:

item.title: Pancakes
item.description: Ingredients: Milk Flour Oatmeal Baking Powder Egg Vegetable Oil Spices: Salt   Inctructions: put everything together to a good pourable batter spread the batter in an oiled pan by moving the pan so you get a full thin coverage flip with a spachelor after gaining some color don’t panic the first one is always shit Indescribable:

item.title: Paprika Chicken Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles Chicken Paprika Scallions Cream Cheese Cream Olive Oil Spices: Paprika Pepper Salt Garlic Soja Sauce Sriracha   Inctructions: some hours before: marinate the chicken cook your Noodles cut up Paprika and Scallions with some Olive Oil start frying in order: Chicken Noodles Paprika and Scallions after everything is fried to your taste add some Cream and Cream Cheese, ceason with some additional Salt and Pepper keep it on low heat until you have no liquid left and Cream coaded Noodles Indescribable:
